docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Sept. 6 (U.P.) -- More than 500,000 Germans, organized as Storm Troopers, are scattered strategically through South America in a campaign for "Nazification" of the continent, Raul Damonte Taborda, Chairman of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Sept. 6 (U.P.) -- More than 500,000 Germans, organized as Storm Troopers, are scattered strategically through South America in a campaign for "Nazification" of the continent, Raul Damonte Taborda, Chairman of the Congressional Committee Investigating Anti-Argentine Activities, charged today.
docs.abstract: Damonte charges German Storm Troopers, with von Thermann as chief, are placed strategically throughout continent

headline.main: NAZI WEB IS SEEN IN SOUTH AMERICA; Argentine Committee Charges 500,000 Storm Troopers Are Scattered Over Continent

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Sept. 11 -- President Roosevelt has ordered the Navy to destroy on sight any Grerman or Italian submarines or raiders entering waters "the protection of which is necessary for American defense." Not only shall American shipping be thus...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 11 -- President Roosevelt has ordered the Navy to destroy on sight any Grerman or Italian submarines or raiders entering waters "the protection of which is necessary for American defense." Not only shall American shipping be thus protected, but British and Allied shipping as well.

headline.main: WAR UP TO HITLER; President Says We Can No Longer Stand By as Nazis Imperil Sea ACTION 'AT ONCE' Attacks and Plots Are Linked to Design to Conquer Americas PRESIDENT ORDERS THE NAVY TO SHOOT

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Sept. 13 -- Many Argentines were most unpleasantly surprised when they saw recently in a newsreel the launching in Rio de Janeiro of a destroyer built in Brazilian yards by Brazilian labor. They were driven to the unhappy reflection...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Sept. 13 -- Many Argentines were most unpleasantly surprised when they saw recently in a newsreel the launching in Rio de Janeiro of a destroyer built in Brazilian yards by Brazilian labor. They were driven to the unhappy reflection that Argentina was in no position to match such an achievement, for she possesses neither the industrial equipment, the skilled craftsmen nor the necessary materials to produce anything so ambitious as a warship.

docs.snippet: THE Fall cruise season is taking shape. Ship lines, furbishing up for busy days ahead, announce good bookings and plenty of diversion in port towns they touch. Spring is on the way in South America where flowers fill plazas and parks from October to...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE Fall cruise season is taking shape. Ship lines, furbishing up for busy days ahead, announce good bookings and plenty of diversion in port towns they touch. Spring is on the way in South America where flowers fill plazas and parks from October to December, to be followed by the season of crowded beach resorts and outdoor sports.

headline.main: Autumn Cruise Programs to Latin Lands -- Life in Yellowstone -- Nassau Service

docs.snippet: WITH Major Paul Pleiss, formerly of the United States Army, I have just completed a five-month motor-car expedition through all the South American republics with the exception of Paraguay. It was an amazing trip through tropical jungles, over the...
docs.lead_paragraph: WITH Major Paul Pleiss, formerly of the United States Army, I have just completed a five-month motor-car expedition through all the South American republics with the exception of Paraguay. It was an amazing trip through tropical jungles, over the Andes, through modern capitals and primiative Indian villages, and across the roadless Patagonian pampas to the Strait of Magellan.

headline.main: CIRCLING SOUTH AMERICA'S RIM; Log of a 13,000-Mile, Five-Month Motor Trip Down the West Coast Over the High Andes, Deserts, Jungles and Plains
